item.description: Game Description Competitive fights in Kinky Fight Club allow you to enjoy observing beautiful girls who compete on the field for winning the match. The main task of each round is to bring the enemy to orgasm, by applying cunning tricks and secret techniques. The game is designed for an adult audience of users who have reached adulthood. The project contains a large amount of erotic content, which can be unacceptable for young players.

item.title: The Sojourn
item.description: Game Description The Sojourn is an adventure puzzle game with a first-person view, where the user will travel through fictional worlds. These are parallel universes representing Light and Darkness. Go through obstacles to discover the truth about the nature of existence. The story has a classic idea about the confrontation between Good and Evil. The main character appeared in a stunning world, but here everything is not as it really is.

item.title: Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game
item.description: Game Description Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game is an adventure game in which the player is invited to travel around the world by car. The universe around the main character experienced a terrible apocalypse, turning into a desert. Graphically, the project is made using low-detail textures to create its own style. The locations where the gamer is present are created randomly thanks to the use of artificial intelligence in the process of generating territories, which is responsible for randomizing the environment.

item.title: Squad
item.description: Game Description Squad is a military tactical first person shooter game. This is a multiplayer game with an emphasis on realism. An important role is assigned to team interaction between users. This project does not have a story campaign or single player modes. Instead, players in it capture points, destroy weapons depots, or hold the defense. The title was originally called Project Reality. This was a modification for the second “Battle”.

item.title: Endless Furry Killer 2020
item.description: Game Description The conflict in Endless Furry Killer 2020 puts a player against the endless waves of anthropomorphic opponents. The gamer has to move through two -dimensional arenas with a view of the top intended for continuous battles. The key lesson lies in the shooting of goals in a tense struggle for life with a constant stream of enemies. Such a gameplay requires constant movement and aiming to defeat non -aloscorizing resistance.

item.title: Phasmophobia
item.description: Game Description Phasmophobia is a cooperative horror game designed for four players. The plot is built around paranormal phenomena, where a group of researchers is trying to prove with the help of special equipment that spirits and ghosts exist. You have to collect as much evidence as possible to find out what type of evil entity you are dealing with. Having studied the strengths and weaknesses of otherworldly forces, begin to expel demons.

item.title: Hades
item.description: Game Description In the roguelikeHades you will constantly engage in epic battles. Upgrade new abilities by fighting enemies. Gifts can be acquired by meeting the gods of Olympus, who will be happy to give you a piece of their power. Complete the instructions of Zeus, Athena, or simply get to know them to master new skills or equipment. Every time you meet a new character, you will witness some interesting event.

item.title: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos
item.description: Game Description The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos is a humorous adventure set in the Naheulbeuk Universe. John Lang wrote a comedy series based on role-playing game parodies and heroic adventures. The developers decided to create a game based on the author’s universe. In a dungeon set in a fantasy setting, clumsy characters try to get their hands on treasure. The RPG has complex tactical elements, with a dose of humor, unexpected surprises and ridiculous encounters.

item.title: Wingspan (Wings)
item.description: Game Description Wingspan (wings) - a collectible card game based on the same tough. The version for personal computers is designed for a session of one to five people. Players are assigned the role of ornithologists involved in studying new species of birds and trying to collect and bring as many rare individuals as possible to the natural reserve. Gathering in the world of various birds, more points go to those who will be able to get a unique and dying look.

item.title: Ostranauts
item.description: Game Description Ostranauts-a role-playing lifetime in a zero gravity in a noir ship, which is located in outer space. The game supports only a single -user study of the universe, and has no voice acting, the information is submitted in the form of text in subtitles or notes. The main character is a character that is created and customized personally by a gamer in order to achieve uniqueness. Also, before the start of the passage, the initial ship is also set up, which is subject to further improvement after collecting the necessary resources.

item.title: ULTRAKILL
item.description: Game Description ULTRAKILL is a game inspired by classic and modern shooters. You will find yourself in a future where people have become extinct. Now the main thing on the planet has become machines whose fuel is blood. There was little valuable liquid left on the surface of the Earth, and so robots began to explore the underground world in search of living creatures. Game Features: Fight multiple enemies. Destroy the risen dead, demonic creatures and other profit seekers.

item.title: The Divine Invasion
item.description: Game Description The Divine Invasion is an adventure action that uses a third -person camera, which allows you to better consider dynamic fights with crowds of enemies and increases the view around the hero. The setting of this project, developed by a small indie studio, becomes a science fiction future with multiple elements of a popular direction-cyberpanus. Thanks to the main task of the gamer, which consists in the extermination of enemies, the game can be considered a simulator of a bond hunter, which serves as mysterious employers for a huge monetary reward.

item.title: Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk
item.description: Game Description Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk is a short visual novel with a deep message and unusual execution, made by the efforts of one developer, one of the indie creators. The visual design of the single-player campaign, which is the only game mode, is made using only two colors - purple and black. For completing a short story, which will take about 15 minutes, the developer has prepared three rewards, implementing a small list of achievements.

item.title: Chronicon
item.description: Game Description Chronicon has a large amount of content, despite its indie-production. There are about 900 skills, abyles and perks and 700 items. The main campaign is divided into 4 acts: a fallen temple, an elven war, Clerburg Castle and dangerous wastelands. Of the classes, the choice is available: Templar, berserker, guard and sorcerer. These are a kind of analogue of the paladin, warrior, archer and magician. Each has various talent branches with active and passive skills.

item.title: Factorio
item.description: Game Description The new planet should have everything to provide people with a comfortable, peaceful existence. Factorio is a sandbox in 2D graphics, where a new planet should be fully equipped for the future life of people. As soon as we arrive in a new place, we need to extract resources, assemble elements from them, and build structures so that people in the future can settle in and exist peacefully. Don’t forget that the planet reacts aggressively to colonizers.

item.title: Risk of Rain 2
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain 2 is a continuation of the classic online game, which has become better and more complex than the original. The player will challenge the cruel world alone or team up with friends to defeat hordes of monsters, collect the necessary relics and escape from the terrifying planet. With each new attempt, you will be able to better understand the behavior of your opponents and defeat them outright with your skills, even when they are outnumbered.

item.title: The Henry Stickmin Collection
item.description: Game Description The Henry Stickmin Collection - a collection of games about the adventures of Henry Stickmin. This is a series of humorous adventure games that give you freedom of choice. The Henry Stickmin Collection is an updated classic, represented by 6 different games in the series. Both canon endings are included, as well as completely new end credits. Choice is at the core of The Henry Stickmin Collection’s gameplay. At each stage of the adventure you make a choice.

item.title: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
item.description: Game Description There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is a humorous adventure game where you have to click on every element available in the locations. You are taken on an amazing adventure through different video game universes. The visual style of the game is made in a 2D pixel style. Each of the numerous characters in There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is voiced and played by professional actors. On your way there are many puzzles that need to be solved in an unconventional way.

item.title: Empyrion - Galactic Survival
item.description: Game Description Empyrion - Galactic Survival shows the world of the future. In the 24th century, in the ice of Antarctica, they find a spacecraft of aliens. Scientists investigated the object and discovered the technology of the hyperdrod. Earthlings send an expedition to the planet Empirion, which is in the Andromeda nebula. The crew gets to the destination, but tolerates the crash and cannot return home. In survival mode, the player leaves the rescue capsule and is alone against the hostile world.

item.title: The Battle of Polytopia
item.description: Game Description The Battle of Polytopia is a turn-based strategy game with city builder elements. The events of the game develop in the fictional world of Square. There are 12 factions to choose from, one of which you can start a campaign for. Lead your people to world domination by expanding your sphere of influence and exploring new technologies. You will explore the surrounding lands, develop various technologies and collect useful materials, on the basis of which your base will develop.

item.title: Travellers Rest
item.description: Game Description Travellers Rest gives the opportunity to live the life of an innkeeper. You own a small tavern that you dream to turn into a noisy and crowded place in the district. But to achieve this goal, you need to work a lot. Build a bro -up and cook the most delicious beer. Manage the farm and serve only the best products on the table. Satisfy customer requests and gain popularity so that a whole kingdom speaks of your institution!

item.title: Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends
item.description: Game Description Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends is a dynamic and bloody fighting game, the action of which takes place in an alternative version of our reality, where characters from books, urban legends, cryptozoology, mythology and folklore exist. All heroes of Terrordrome are monsters and villains. The game shows a hypothetical world where all the scary stories heard turned out to be true. There is a story campaign for Alex Van Helsing.

item.title: Wobbly Life
item.description: Game Description Wobbly Life is a bright and dynamic sandbox that relies on an open world and body physics. The gameplay is tailored for local and online co-op. Team up with friends to compete in various mini-games and competitions. There is a single-player game aimed at developing your hero. Earn money and spend it on new skins, clothes, equipment and much more. You will explore the vastness of Wobbly Island, controlling cute characters that resemble children’s toys.

item.title: Outer Wilds
item.description: Game Description Outer Wilds is a first-person action-adventure game based on the popular Groundhog Day theme. Events take place on the fictional planet Kamelok, which is destroyed by a star explosion 22 minutes after the start of the game. But the story is just beginning. The user finds himself in a “time loop”, which allows you to gradually develop the plot, travel through the planetary system and meet new characters. After a “reboot” of life, all accumulated information remains available.

item.title: Baldi's Basics Plus
item.description: Game Description Baldi’s Basics Plus - a parody of the first -person horror and educational games of the 90s. All levels are randomly generated, and mini-games are made in bright colors and allow you to go to nature. Baldi’s Basics Plus is an extended version of the original game containing more objects and characters. The game contains a huge number of strange characters and useful objects necessary for passing. Exploring the confusing corridors of Baldie’s school, the hero will come across many random and hilarious events.

item.title: Wooden Ocean
item.description: Game Description Wooden Ocean presents a narrative that begins when a teenager named Simon is transported to another world, and 42 years later, Violet goes in search of her brother Marcus. The setting is a simulation inside a structure called the Infinite Hotel, which serves as a kind of afterlife and contains many other virtual realities. It is inhabited by both local residents unaware of the nature of their existence and knowledgeable individuals, as well as entities such as demons, poets, angels and gods.

item.title: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal
item.description: Game Description Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal - Pacific War Naval Warfare dives into the air conflicts that unfolded in the Pacific during World War II. This strategy game puts you in the middle of the historical battles between the US and Japan in 1942-1943. Using a system of hexes and counters, the title tasks you with outflanking your opponent while defending critical areas or attacking key enemy positions. It’s all about decision making: when to strike, when to retreat, how to preserve your carriers and prevent the enemy from gaining a foothold.

item.title: Pyro Fighters
item.description: Game Description Pyro Fighters sets the fighters to recapture the attack of an alien army at long levels. Each character is armed with flamethrower - a universal tool for attack and movement. If you direct the weapon down, reactive traction is created for flight. The same stream of flame destroys enemies, which forces to constantly choose between the retention of heights and fire. Monitoring the only resource underlies each clash and requires a competent distribution of forces in stressful conditions.

item.title: Zompiercer
item.description: Game Description Conceptively Zompiercer is a sandbox with an open detailed world, but the whole thing is played as a first-person shooter about survival during the zombie apocalypse. The planet is covered by a virus. People mutated in bloodthirsty walking corpses. Not many managed to survive, but you are lucky more than the rest. Or not? Survival is just beginning! The game from an independent developer under the nickname DDDIMANN is not a comprehension not by the setting, but by the scale and the implementation of ideas.

item.title: Automobilista 2
item.description: Game Description Automobilista 2 is a continuation of the video game of the same name, which displays a series of car races to a new level. An important innovation compared to the first part is the transition to the eminent Project Cars engine called Madness. This contributed to the addition of advanced graphic technologies, including a realistic weather change, precisely recreated carriers and tracks, and many other functions. In the project, you will face a variety of single modes - Custom Race and Test Day.

item.title: Ostriv
item.description: Game Description OSTRIV, this is a city -building simulator that makes you the ruler of the monarch of the 18th century. The player will have to work hard and show his ability to the manager, as well as creative abilities. The goal of the game to transfer the gameplay of simulators of this kind to a new level, by means of adding a huge number of opportunities and abandoning the usual restrictions.

item.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
item.description: Game Description Ori and the Will of the Wisps is an adventure platformer with stunning hand-drawn graphics. You will find yourself in distorted lands that you must save from evil and overcome all the obstacles prepared by fate for the main character. You will take control of the little spirit Ori, who knows a lot about the obstacles and pitfalls of this world. Your owl friend Ku is in trouble after another flight.

item.title: Black Mesa
item.description: Game Description Black Mesa is a remake of the cult shooter Half-Life, which at one time turned out to be a breakthrough in the world of video games and made the name of Valve. They worked on this project for eight whole years, during which the creators tried to transfer the old game to the new Source engine with varying success. As a result, they managed to achieve the desired effect and in May 2015 the game was released.

item.title: Hex of Steel
item.description: Game Description Players in Hex of Steel have to go during the Second World War, where you will have to control the troops on land, water and in the air. The project is a full -scale Vargam, where you have to perform step -by -step actions on the global map of the world, which includes Europe, Africa and the Pacific regions. Users will be able to fight against AI in a single campaign or special historical scenarios, as well as in the cross -platform mode of PBEM and multiplayer skirmishes against other users (there is the possibility of cooperative passage).

item.title: The Test
item.description: Game Description The Test is a psychological horror with elements of a visual novel, role-playing adventure, and immersive sim with a lot of text monologues inside the protagonist’s head. The player gets the opportunity to directly influence what is happening using a decision-making system of varying degrees of importance. The isometric camera allows you to get the best view of the two-dimensional space where all the action of the single-player campaign takes place with a well-developed plot about mental suffering.

item.title: Stoneshard
item.description: Game Description Come in the role of a harsh mercenary in a harsh, ruined war, kingdom. Take part in step -by -step battles and examine the RPG elements of Stoneshard, available in the gameplay. You can perform contracts, secondary and plot missions. Heal the wounds, purchase equipment and improve the protagonist as soon as you wish. Freely move around the big and seamless world. Explore the villages lying in the ruins, go down to the dungeons or look into abandoned tracts.

item.title: The Sapling
item.description: Game Description The Sapling is a simulator in which you will be selected by growing new plant species or crossing animals. Build your own world inhabited by unusual animals and a phantasmagoric fauna. The Sapling allows you to choose a random mutation mode to be a third -party observer, providing nature to conduct evolution itself and create its own ecosystems. At any time, you can take the development of the environment into your own hands.

item.title: Plutocracy
item.description: Game Description Plutocracy is a strategy in which you will be transported to the Golden Age, to the time when the first rich people of the United States of America just appeared. The gameplay will begin in 1870 and continue until the present day. During this gap, you will need to buy out many companies and put your name on the highest line of the board. You will start from scratch and will earn and work to become a shadow ruler.

item.title: Ai War 2
item.description: Game Description In AI WAR 2, an even more advanced version of AI captured the entire galaxy, and left only a tiny planet to the player. It’s time to strike and outwit the enemy. This will come in handy new capabilities, large flotillas and hacking skills. Or you can get involved in a much more confusing galactic struggle. On the agenda - macrophages, Dyson spheres, nanocosts and much more. Each faction has its own goal, its own rules, units and a completely unique economy.

item.title: Little Big Workshop
item.description: Game Description Little Big Workshop is a meditation game with calm, measured gameplay. The passage begins very strangely, someone left a game with figures of little human workers on his desktop. And this someone begins to fantasize that these little men come to life, and work is in full swing in their toy workshop. It is the fantasies of the mysterious protagonist that gamers will have to watch. The strategy will not give the player time to rest, because orders will immediately begin to arrive, and the virtual phone will be ringing off the hook with constant calls to it.

item.title: Beat Hazard 2
item.description: Game Description Beat Hazard 2 - continuation of the bright representative of the Shoot ‘Em Up genre. You have to plunge into dizzying shootings on flying ships, and destroy the hordes of enemies to drive music. The latter occupies most in the video game, and the help of it in each battle can find its tone and rhythm, on which even the outcome of the battle can depend. Or connect your tracks to destroy the hordes of enemies to your favorite compositions much more fun.

item.title: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut
item.description: Game Description Disco Elysium is an RPG in which a detective must use his skills to conduct a unique investigation. The player will have to interrogate well-developed characters, investigate murders, and, if desired, take bribes. You can become either the savior of the city or the worst disaster for all humanity. Game Features: Unique branched dialogue system. Wide freedom of choice both in the story narrative and in additional tasks. Well-developed characters with their own stories and personalities.

item.title: Police Stories
item.description: Game Description John Reims and Rick Jones are two brave cops trying to put the streets of his hometown in order. Police Stories is a story full of intrigues and conspiracies. Having learned the motives of some heroes, a terrible truth will open. But on the way to the answers, many hostages have to be saved, kill the pack of bandits and neutralize a huge number of bombs. Police Stories implemented mechanics:

item.title: Kind Words (lo fi chill beats to write to)
item.description: Game Description Kind Words (lo fi chill beats to write to) is a casual indie game that taps into a variety of human feelings and emotions to create a memorable adventure with relaxing gameplay that creates a good mood. The user will have to write letters to random people, with or without reason, to provide support or for the purpose of dialogue on abstract topics for the sake of self-development and broadening his horizons.

item.title: Singled Out
item.description: Game Description Singled Out is a test of reaction speed and observation, where the task is to accurately identify a target in a crowd. The player is presented with a kaleidoscope of eccentric creatures, but only one of them matches the three descriptive characteristics provided. An inexorable ten-second timer forces you to act as quickly as possible, because any mistake or delay leads to failure. The search process turns into an intense visual puzzle, where every second counts and extreme concentration on the smallest details of appearance is required.

item.title: Microtown
item.description: Game Description Microtown is a urban planning simulator in which you will control your own settlement. Build the village of your dreams, lead it inhabitants and try to expand your possessions in order to become the most prosperous settlement on all land. Microtown’s gameplay is emphasized on production chains. You begin your way as a small village, gradually expanding to a huge city. Explore the surrounding territories, collect and process resources to not only improve the city, but also provide a happy life for your settlers.

item.title: A Short Hike
item.description: Game Description A Short Hike is an adventure game designed to provide a true sense of exploration and enjoy the vibrant scenery of the mountain town of Hawk Peak. The plot is extremely simple - the main character wants to climb the highest mountain. Starting your journey from a small settlement at the very foot of the mountain, you have to overcome a long and eventful path, full of obstacles and dangers.

item.title: Oxygen Not Included
item.description: Game Description The player’s task inOxygen Not Included is to obtain food, water, oxygen, valuable resources and happiness for the duplicates - the inhabitants of his colony. The world settled into different parts, because of this, half of the people went to other planets, and the second part called themselves duplicates and decided to travel through space, flying between asteroids. The idea of ​​the most hardcore survival simulator in a strategic shell - Oxygen Not Included - shows that maintaining your own base and several people on it is incredibly difficult.

item.title: Interstellar Space: Genesis
item.description: Game Description Interstellar Space: Genesis is a turn-based strategy on a global map that uses the popular setting of outer space in an alternative universe where the distant future has arrived. The world is inhabited by various races that have their own history, advantages over others and disadvantages that they try to hide. Before starting a new save, the player is given a choice of 6 available factions. There is functionality that makes it possible to create a unique state for governance.

item.title: People Playground
item.description: Game Description People Playground is an indie game, a kind of murder simulator in different ways. Here you can simply drag mannequins of creatures across the screen and throw them from a height, or create dangerous situations with your own hands - accidents, torture chambers, obstacle courses. There are 5 types of creatures available for destruction: a fragile person, a heavier and stronger robot, a gorse (spider), a regular and improved turret.

item.title: Streets of Rogue
item.description: Game Description A new measures come to a prosperous futuristic city, which introduces a dry law. This caused the rebellion and chaos in Streets of Rogue. The inhabitants of the town created the headquarters of resistance, which is hidden underground. They plan to overthrow a cruel dictator, so we need a hero who will fulfill this task. Having chosen the class of the protagonist, the user will begin his path from the lower floor.

item.title: Muse Dash
item.description: Game Description Muse Dash is a dynamic rhythm game in anime style, where you will visit many colorful locations, dance to the rhythm of fiery songs and send enemies into outer space. At the center of the story are three charismatic beauties. Having chosen one of the heroines, you need to fight with various creatures in the rhythm of the dance. The action will take place on a colorful background accompanied by dynamic dance music.

item.title: Steel Division 2
item.description: Game Description Steel Division 2 is a real -time strategy, during which you will visit the role of Army General during the Bagration Operation. The plot was established during the Second World War on the Eastern Front, and there are thousands of fighters under your command. Thanks to an extensive list of opportunities, the gameplay can take you tens of hours. Pass the plot missions or participate in free mode in a multi -user or single game.

item.title: Spaceengine
item.description: Game Description Spaceengine is a space simulator that makes a photorealistic open space at your disposal that simulates the universe. The SpaceenGine gameplay can be described as an interactive planetarium with procedural generation. Study the long -range corners of the cosmos, visit the planets and fly on a hypercost shuttle. The simulator modifies the spaces of space on a scale of 1: 1. Everything is available in the game: billions of galaxies, foggy, stars and planets - go anywhere and examine any part of the universe.

item.title: Beat Saber
item.description: Game Description A musical game designed for the good taste of the playerBeat Saber. The levels are a small interactive location where blocks of 2 colors fly towards the player. The player must cut these blocks. The difficulty of the game is that the number of blocks and the method of destruction are always different. For example, in some levels you will have to chop them with a sword of a certain color, in others you will have to hit them from the right side.

item.title: MORDHAU
item.description: Game Description MORDHAU is a hack and slash game. Fights take place online on the company’s servers; offline you can train your skills in fights against artificial intelligence. A training session is also available, in which you will learn the basic mechanics and get your initial gold capital. The name refers to a special German grip on the weapon, which, by the way, is available for selection. The main, but not the only feature is a fencing system that is as close to reality as possible, created through consultations with experts.

item.title: Katana ZERO
item.description: Game Description Katana ZERO is an extraordinary and dynamic platformer in the genre of science fiction and action, created in the best traditions of pixel graphics. The plot of the game tells us about a dystopian city, the main character lives in the third quarter, his name is Zero. He was severely wounded in the war, causing him to lose his memory. At night he has nightmares about past battles, and during the day he has to visit a psychotherapist.

item.title: Wushu Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Wushu Chronicles is an adventure role-playing game that invites you to explore the vast expanses of an open eastern world. Events take place during the early Ming Dynasty. The story begins in the 25th year of Hongwu’s reign and continues until the Battle of Jingnan. You have to explore the world of Ming Wushu, which is filled with numerous activities and interesting quests. There are two dozen factions that you are free to join.

item.title: Unheard
item.description: Game Description Unheard is a well-developed detective simulator with many implemented mechanics aimed at allowing the player to understand the crimes committed in various ways. A team of indie developers worked on the project, with a rather unusual idea and implementation, who decided to use the setting of detective fiction, because the protagonist uses devices that are not available in the real world. The devices make it possible to establish some kind of invisible connection between criminals and lawmen.

item.title: Baba Is You
item.description: Game Description Baba Is You is a game in the popular puzzle genre. The project, developed by indie programmer Hempuli Oi, uses pixel graphics and a camera positioned high above, which creates conditions for greater visibility around the protagonist for faster response to changes. The single-player campaign is divided into 200 separate levels with increasing difficulty, introducing much more intricate puzzles on the way to the final scene, and the use of new mechanics.

item.title: Truberbrook
item.description: Game Description Trüberbrook takes place in 1967, at a time when the lunar race between the USA and the USSR was in full swing. Student rallies and protests are taking place from Russia to Europe, carrying their slogans in Paris, Berlin, Budapest and Warsaw. The world is full of chaos, but what do we care about the whole world while the German province is dominated by one big problem? Hans Tannhäuser is an American student.

item.title: Galaxy Truckker: Extended Edition
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Truckker: Extended Edition - a strategy about truckers from distant space. The gameplay was based on the same tough. You will build cosmic shuttles, evade asteroids and enter into battle with a huge number of enemies. The main task is to earn as many cosmicredites as possible. The life of a cosmic trucker is not easy. The Galaxy Truckker game process: Extended Edition offers a branch scenario, the events of which depend on your moral elections.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofSpace Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: Touhou Luna Nights
item.description: Game Description Touhou Luna Nights is a platformer that immerses you in the atmosphere of gothic mysticism. The main character is Sakuya Izaei, who works as a senior maid for the vampire Remilia Scarlet. The girl was calmly doing housework when the mistress deprived her of her powers and sent her to the “Magical Space.” Sakuya is looking for her way home and is eager to find out what her treacherous boss is up to.

item.title: A Dance of Fire and Ice
item.description: Game Description A Dance of Fire and Ice-a rhythm explosion created by a small indie company, which has used a minimalistic style of graphic design for its brainchild so that nothing distracts from a study of exciting levels of different complexity. The player needs to constantly be on the alert and not relax for a second, because the game throws difficulties at every turn. Two planets, united by an invisible connection, fall under the control of a gamer (using a keyboard or a gamepad).

item.title: Slay the Spire
item.description: Game Description InSlay the Spire the main task of the gamer is to climb to the upper levels of a tower consisting of many rooms. During the passage, you can have one of 4 characters, collect a collection of cards, defeat intermediate enemies and defeat the main villain. The locations and forks of the tower are constantly changing, the whole process can be divided into three acts and at the end of each of them the main character must defeat the local boss.

item.title: Wrench
item.description: Game Description Wrench is an auto mechanic simulator with an emphasis on realism. The task of this game is to clarify the breakdown of the car and the subsequent elimination of problems. Most cars will arrive from racing tracks, so some problems will make your head break. Your career growth begins with the position of a younger assistant who is engaged in the replacement of car liquids and tires. As you pass, the game will teach you professional skills, allowing you to move along the career ladder and move to your goal.

item.title: Penkura
item.description: Game Description Penkura combines several genres: action, adventure, RPG and strategy. Gamers find themselves in a unique world where they have to survive and thrive in an alien environment. The title begins with users traveling through an ancient singularity and landing on the distant world of Karenos. Here they will have to collect resources, explore ancient ruins and build a base that will help them cope with the upcoming trials. The combination of different gameplay styles creates an atmosphere that requires strategic thinking and adaptation at every turn.

item.title: Bloons TD 6
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 action strategy game where the player will have to defend a fortress with the help of monkeys. The goal of the game is to destroy a stream of fast-moving balloons. The fewer goals missed, the greater the chances of winning. The balls differ in appearance and characteristics - new ones have been added in this part: purple, reinforced and impenetrable.

item.title: GRIS
item.description: Game Description GRIS is a standard platformer, made entirely in bed colors and a constant atmosphere of suffering of the human soul, capturing the reality of pain and the entire oppressive existence. The personification of everything bad lies in the perception of the girl Gris. She is naive, so she suffered a lot in her life. The heroine’s power lies in her dress, which gives her unique abilities. One element of a woman’s wardrobe can replace the protagonist’s entire world in the forge of pain.

item.title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
item.description: Game Description Insurgency: Sandstorm is a sequel to a multiplayer shooter built on deathmatches in confined spaces, with the ability to use light vehicles. The game has been significantly improved and expanded. The key to victory lies only through well-coordinated teamwork. The action takes place in the Middle East, on the ruins of settlements and military bases. You need to carefully choose your weapon and explore the territory, because without caution and tactics you can quickly catch a bullet in the forehead.

item.title: DUSK
item.description: Game Description DUSK is a canonical first-person shooter created in a retro style. The plot is quite simple and clear - there is a small town called DUSK, in its vicinity ruins were discovered that have mystical properties. Many scientists and soldiers came here, studying strange objects and everyone gradually went crazy. They became possessed, and the government surrounded the entire area with a wall. A brave hero was found who entered the forbidden territory in search of these unique artifacts, but was captured by occultists and hung on hooks.

item.title: Kingdom Two Crows
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Two Crowns is a cooperative microstrategy that tells about the brave, who has become a king and now he needs to gather his army. Having saddled the right horse, he goes on a long journey to expand the kingdom. He will be opposed by the army of greed, trying to take everything from him that he has set up with his own labor. The game offers to rush not only in European medieval landscapes, but also to see many radically new ones.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: Parkitect
item.description: Game Description The game is a simulator where the construction of the amusement park will be the main task. Parkitect surpasses the rest of the games of this genre due to tactical management, the economic component and entertainment, which the player can only dream of. Initially, you are given a small plot of land and a few resources. Your task, as a manager of this park, invite as many people as possible.

item.title: Pocket Rogues
item.description: Game Description Pocket Rogues is a role RPG created in the fantasy genre with pixel graphics. The plot tells us about the young young man, who is the seeker of treasures, he found the greatest and mysterious dungeon. Many heroes did not return from here, but we are destined to see a real evil. Ambition, a thirst for wealth and genuine interest simply do not leave a gamer. The gamer has to break through with each subsequent battle through many levels, the generation of which is carried out by an endless random creation.

item.title: The Colonists
item.description: Game Description The Colonists are a urban planning sandbox in which you control a team of robots that create themselves. In the game you do not have to fight or kill enemies. The plot side of the project is meditative. You are landing on the planet, begin to carry out non -difficult tasks in which you need to build a settlement, and then improve your town depending on the preferences. Also in the game there is a “free mode” - here you make an island yourself, plant robots, begin to build a city from the resources obtained.

item.title: Return of the Obra Dinn
item.description: Game Description Return of Obra Dinn is an incredibly challenging game that will take over your head and drive you crazy for days. The quest in the game is made in 1-bit graphics, where reflection and logic are a priority. Despite the fact that the game’s graphics are too primitive, the developer was able to make it varied, depicting many objects, capturing the lives of the heroes and giving us half-valued 50-60 hours of gameplay if we find absolutely everything.

item.title: RimWorld
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city planning and strategic base development on a planet unknown to the player. The player inRimWorld must build a base where the last forces of people are concentrated. To survive, get food, study the technology tree and understand what the planet wants from you is the main task of the player. The project itself is characterized by the enormous depth of built mechanics that you can apply to your buildings and the base as a whole.

item.title: Mashinky
item.description: Game Description The strategic simulator - Mashinky - about how to create your own network of trains and cars that will bring you money, and in return you can modernize or send them to rest when buying new equipment. Around you are beautiful landscapes of the Czech Republic, Poland, Germany and England. The sun sits down, and floods the evening light of the forest and fields, granting nightlife to residents. In the game, a system of day, night and time in general is thought out.

item.title: On the Western Front
item.description: Game Description On the Western Front - this is a tactical strategy, the action of which unfolds against the background of the First World War, namely on the infamous Western Front. Users take on the role of the division commander, who are instructed to manage various aspects of military operations in one of the most exhausting and complex periods in history. The Title emphasizes the harsh realities of the trench war, where the soldiers are faced with many problems, from the constant threat of enemy fire to the constant need to manage resources.

item.title: Crosscode
item.description: Game Description Crosscode fantasy pitch tells about the young girl Lea, playing in the MMO called Crosscode. That is how, this ambitious project tells about the usual routine rutin classes. According to the plot, events unfold in the near future, where virtual reality has become more interesting than the real one. That is why many people spend days in their favorite toys in search of fun. Lea spends extremely a lot of time here, but there is misfortune.

item.title: Liftoff: FPV Drone Racing
item.description: Game Description Liftoff FPV Drone Racing is a training ground for quadcopter pilots. The game is a training ground for both beginners and an obstacle course for experienced gamers. Professionals can test their strength in a new environment, and people who have recently become interested in this sport can hone their skills before taking on real prototypes. In Liftoff FPV Drone Racing, users can take their first steps towards the sport of quadcopter racing.

item.title: Mad Restaurant People
item.description: Game Description Mad Restaurant People makes it possible to feel all the difficulty of working as a waiter. The game is presented with a top distance, which makes it possible to observe the entire hall at once. Take orders, serve customers, serve dishes in time, count the guests and much more. Mad Restaurant People is a full -fledged waiter’s simulator who will not let you relax for a second. The gameplay requires attentiveness, reaction speed, good memory and many other important qualities.

item.title: Unknown Fate
item.description: Game Description The game consists of constantly searching for objects and solving puzzles. We become a certain entity that helps the main character, Richard, cope with amnesia. He wakes up in a world completely unfamiliar to him, tries to remember at least something, but his attempts end in failure. The main task of the player is to find the appropriate items needed in the task, as well as solve a lot of puzzles.

item.title: SCUM
item.description: Game Description SCUM is another survival game set in a completely open world. The developers tried to make the gameplay and the story of the characters so absurd that the very fact of some actions causes disgust. The plot reveals to us a modern society that wants nothing more than to “watch the spectacle.” The well-known producer TEC1 organized a show with the name - Scam - where people are thrown out in an open location, forced to survive without everything, and after that they are gradually introduced to a series of difficulties: a zombie epidemic, robots, dangerous animals, or money with the promise that once they get out , players will be able to spend them to buy freedom in the new society.

item.title: Airships: Conquer the Skies
item.description: Game Description Airships: Conquer the Skies (2018) is a multiplayer sandbox indie action and strategy game developed by David Stark under his own publishing house for various platforms, including PC. Airships has extremely positive reviews on various resources. The game is truly loved by gamers from all over the world. So what will you have to do? Build pixelated skyships in steampunk style! The buildings are shown in cross-section and from the side, and their modules are controlled by crew members.

item.title: Mist Survival
item.description: Game Description Another survival game among zombies is Mist Survival. A completely open world, a unique system of characteristics, new types of weapons, shelters and the ability to create their own gang, attracted new players to fight on an open map against the crowd of enraged people absorbed in the epidemic. The main character, like all real players, will be protected from the epidemic, because in their body there is a special hormone that needs to be nourished every day.

item.title: Dead Cells
item.description: Game Description A stunning rogue-like platformer with metroidvania elements -Dead Cells - features a real fight between the hero and constantly changing levels on the territory of the castle. Our hero is a creature who is trying to get out of the castle’s maze. He will try over and over again to cope with constantly generated opponents. But in random places on the map you will find many weapons with random characteristics.

item.title: GNOG
item.description: Game Description The GNOG puzzle includes dozens of three -dimensional puzzles based on tactile interaction and a solution by detecting different moving parts. In the course of passing on the screen, the bizarre heads of the monster are displayed. Each creature hides the mysterious dimension required for the study. The player’s main task is to pull and touch every detail of the object that appears on the screen. Many elements from an unusual figure are interactive and help to come closer to unraveling.

item.title: Super Destronaut DX
item.description: Game Description Super Destronaut DX puts the player under the control of one ship at the base of the screen, opposing the ordered waves of alien vessels descending the system. The gameplay consists of horizontal movement and firing up - a structure borrowed from classic arcade shoot ‘Em Up. Success is measured not only with survival, but also by a continuous set of glasses with multiple for the effective destruction of enemy columns.

item.title: Just Shapes & Beats
item.description: Game Description Just Shapes & Beats offers gameplay based on the sound of music and beats. The difficulty level of the game depends on the rhythm of the soundtrack. The user takes control of a blue square; Many difficulties await him ahead. In the process, the hero is helped by friends, with whom he fights enemies. The game supports online and local co-op with 4 players in Story Mode and Challenge Runs.

item.title: FAR: Lone Sails
item.description: Game Description A simulator of controlling a unique ship in a platformer - FAR: Lone Sails - allows you to explore all the land on Earth after the apocalypse. The plot tells very little about the ship itself, but we understand that the owner of the ship several times cut out, changed, and improved the ship so that it could travel unhindered through the desert. The gameplay consists of us moving the ship around locations, but not forgetting about the character inside it.

item.title: House Flipper
item.description: Game Description A renovation crew simulator in which you take on the role of the boss and the only employee -House Flipper - allows you to destroy beautiful houses, but build beautiful apartments with amazing renovations in their place. In this game you can make rooms the way you see them in your life. The game also encourages you to use the latest repair tools, but one thing remains unchanged: you’ll have to take down walls with a sledgehammer!

item.title: Hyperspace Dogfights
item.description: Game Description Hyperspace Dogfights is a two -dimensional horned focused on jet battles. It is necessary to break through through the waves of opponents, using acceleration to bypass threats, as well as gravity for occupying a profitable position. A special hyperople-decline helps to fly through dense fire. Each departure becomes unique thanks to the collection and installation of more than 300 items that modify the characteristics of the fighter, which allows you to create unlike each other assemblies.

item.title: Monster Prom
item.description: Game Description Monster Prom is a humorous date simulator that includes mature topics, abusive words and obscene scenarios. The plot tells the gamer that he has 3 weeks left before the graduation evening, that the hero is a monster and still has not found a couple. But this is in the order of things, as many of the school have similar problems. Take part in a single game or cooperative mode up to 4 participants.

item.title: Zero-K
item.description: Game Description Zero-K is a real-time strategy. The indie project allows for large-scale battles on land, water and in the air. This RTS has worked out physics and ballistics. During the battles, the landscape changes. You can even level the soil to your tactical needs. The game allows you to create funnels for enemy tanks, digging ditches and erecting embankments, hiding fighters behind the hills so that they are not taken by enemy shells, dig water channels for the passage of their fleet through land, put a soldier on a hill for better visibility and increase the range of shooting.

item.title: Mirror
item.description: Game Description Mirror is a visual novel that perfectly combines erotic content, an RPG component, an interactive plot and battles in which you take a direct part. The whole game is built on the “three in a row” principle. In the casual combination of characters, you will only take part in the battle on the Match 3 battlefield. That is, you will win if you can score more points. The game features three heroines who will oppose you throughout the game.

item.title: Pure Rock Crawling
item.description: Game Description Pure Rock Crawling is an SUV simulator, the main concept of which is built around a realistic simulation of tires and suspension. The developers set a goal to create the most realistic ride on rocky paths, deserts, hills, etc. A meditative ride through the stones is one of the best ways to experience the adventure of the wild lands of the entire planet. At first glance, the task in Pure Rock Crawling is extremely simple: drive through 10 gates consisting of cones to get along a designated route from one point on the map to another.

item.title: Farm Manager 2018
item.description: Game Description Farm Manager 2018 is a simulator for building your own farm, where the territory of your competitors will slowly go into your possessions. A change of day and nights was added to the game. Also, such cultures as cucumbers, apples, strawberries and other varieties were added to the new part. If you are tired of growing simple wheat or oats, then you can definitely change the direction, but do not forget to monitor the economy.

item.title: Through The Ages
item.description: Game Description Through The Ages is a port of a cult board game adapted to personal computers. Compared to the original party in the digital version, they take much less time. Instead of 4-8 hours, a maximum of 1 hour takes the game session, since the computer is engaged in all calculations. According to its concept, Through The Ages resembles the Titles of the Civilization series. Only here development occurs using various cards.

item.title: Bio Inc. Redemption
item.description: Game Description Bio Inc. Redemption is a biomedical simulator where a player has to choose life or death. These are 2 main regimes where you need to perform a variety of tasks. You are able to create deadly diseases, mocking a person presented on the screen. Or put on the medic’s mask and find the virus, look for the vaccine and save the infected ones. The gameplay provides more than 600 diseases existing in the real world, accurate symptoms, diagnostic tests and various ways of treatment for each virus.

item.title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
item.description: Game Description Warhammer: Vermintide 2 is a first-person slasher with abilities, magic, character upgrades, a variety of weapons and meat, combining a unique combat system of 5 different factions. The modernized first part is made on a new graphics engine, allowing us to see every severed limb; look at dead enemies and collect dropped loot around them, not paying attention to graphical inaccuracies. The plot of Warhammer: Vermintide 2 revolves around Helmgarth Castle, surrounded by a small settlement.

item.title: Northgard
item.description: Game Description The Scandinavian strategy of Northgard with a deepening into the ancient mythology of the Vikings, which found Nordgard - a city full of wealth, myths and ancient legends. The game combines the peaceful graphics and the gradual development of your settlement. However, the Vikings quickly cooled their ardor when they met with the first danger of Northgard - a brutal cold enveloping all the shores and heart of the island.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
item.description: Game Description The plot ofKingdom Come: Deliverance takes place in a simple European village. We play as the son of a blacksmith. Our name is Henry. The civil war affected not only the political upheaval, but also ordinary villages and people like yours. Friends, family and your entire lineage have been slaughtered by brutal mercenaries in a sinister plot. We miraculously managed to survive, so we take the last sword forged by our father and march against the army of godless people!

item.title: Rust
item.description: Game Description Rust (Rust) An ideal first-person survival simulator is not a simple escape from a city or civilization, but a necessary measure based on the conditions of our player. In Rust we will have to kill people, animals, build houses, dwellings, try to make fire out of nothing and survive in a world where everything is trying to kill us. The gameplay begins with the fact that we find ourselves on an island.

item.title: Celeste
item.description: Game Description Madeline must climbCeleste . No one knows why she needs this, but the characters around her gradually reveal this secret to us. The game is a complex platformer that combines a storyline, pixel graphics, character leveling and aspects of human existence buried in dialogue scripts. The heroine will fight with ghosts in abandoned cities, with her demons while she walks into the wasteland; will explore the secret corners of his soul while learning a new location and ways to climb the mountain more painlessly.

item.title: Shalnor Legends: Sacred Lands
item.description: Game Description In Shalnor Legends: Sacred Lands, the player follows the trip of the Elf of the Rinna, which goes to the title territory. Its main goal is to complete the complex task created by the goddess Illeria, in order to ultimately become the chosen champion of this deity. The sacred lands obey one special rule: the entrance to this territory is voluntary, but the exit is given only after the complete passage of the test from the goddess.

item.title: Subnautica
item.description: Game Description In the world ofSubnautica, your ship has crashed in an oceanic area, and there is only one straight line - down to the bottom. The landscapes around you are illuminated by the sun, the coral reefs shimmer beautifully under the sun as you slowly sink towards the endless darkness of space. Exploring a huge open world allows you not only to plunge under the water and look at the inhabitants of this ocean, but also to build your own underwater base there and build a research center on it.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Portal
item.description: Game Description The Bridge Constructor Portal project was made into one big puzzle. We play as an employee of the Portal Nature Research Laboratory. Having a constructor under our control, we will build bridges, ramps and other objects in 60 different levels. Each built bridge will help the little men achieve a result - exiting a level to move to another, so Bridge Constructor Portal perfectly combines logical planning and tactical construction of levels.

item.title: Seabed
item.description: Game Description Seabed detective visual novel is revealed through the anime drawing and elements of Yuri, showing the relationship between two cute girls. Players will direct the development of the plot line with the adopted elections, observing the events. We’ll have to look at the world through the prism of the views of three characters that are faced with the problems of illusory dreams and the reality of adult life, which every mature person meets in one way or another.

item.title: Grey Hack
item.description: Game Description The multi -user game Grey Hack makes it possible to feel like a professional hacker. The player is accessible to complete freedom of action as a procedurally generated world web network. At the beginning of the game, only a few programs are available, including File Explorer, Text Editor and Terminal. As a hacker skill grows, many new utilities will appear and a wide range of opportunities will open.

item.title: Finding Paradise
item.description: Game Description In the pixel questFinding Paradise with an isometric space, there is a corporation - Sigmund Corp. Special agents - Eva Rosalin and Neil Watts - became participants in the realization of the dream of one of the people - Colin Reeds. This man is dying, so our heroes undertake to make his last wishes come true. Arriving at his house, you see how doctors prepare his body and brain, connecting Colin to a special machine that allows you to plunge into his memories and find yourself in an interactive virtual reality.

item.title: Gorogoa
item.description: Game Description An entertaining puzzle quest, made in a non-standard genre for a computer game. While playingGorogoa, the player must match images on the screen in a 2x2 grid, where each image has some kind of animated meaning or message. Thus, you create a whole picture that moves you towards the development of the plot, but does not reveal the main message until the very end. The plot reveals to us a certain boy who goes through his whole life in these pictures, so Gorogoa can be called a philosophical parable in which the protagonist will grow up, look at the world differently, and after that he will grow old and begin to reflect on the past.

item.title: StationEers
item.description: Game Description Stationeers will transfer the player to outer space, in which it is necessary to control the space station alone or with other participants. You will follow all aspects of the station. Manage and deal with complex atmospheric, electric, production, medical and other equally important technologies inside a large room. You will need to correctly build mechanisms and other objects to create a beautiful architecture, and also not to die due to a lack of oxygen or an excess of electricity.

item.title: Cogmind
item.description: Game Description Cogmind is a sci-fi roguelike in which you play as a robot assembled from components of other machines. Cogmind combat is presented in a turn-based style. You can explore the big world, hack devices, quietly sneak into strategic places, or act directly and attack your opponents head-on. The gameplay does not limit you to actions. Play the way you want. Your task is to assemble yourself from various modules.

item.title: A Hat in Time
item.description: Game Description In the 3D platformerA Hat in Time we will have to play as a girl who both looks and is called Hat Girl. She goes on an interplanetary journey to return home, but ends up in the city of the Mafia. At this location, a Mafioso gets into our ship and completely inspects the ship, but after checking, he scatters “time particles”, and then spreads them throughout the entire Mafia planet.

item.title: Cuphead
item.description: Game Description InCuphead we choose one of two heroes and set off to conquer a world that looks like very old cartoons, with tons of weapons, special moves and immortality. A classic, in the truest sense of the word, platformer, in which everything is set in the world of the 1930s. The music is jazz accompaniment, the graphics are standard Disney of the time, and the bosses are neither good nor evil.

item.title: Stick Fight: The Game
item.description: Game Description Stick Fight: The Game is a multiplayer platformer with fighting game elements. Players control colorful people, overcoming obstacles and fighting each other. The main gameplay consists of moving, jumping and reacting quickly. On the path of the heroes there will be deadly obstacles that will take the lives of all those who hesitated even a little and did not react to the situation. Game features: from 2 to 4 players over a local or online network; physics-based combat system; about 100 well-developed and detailed locations; includes a level editor; various ranged and melee weapons; procedurally generated and contextual animations based on the system Totally Accurate Battle Simulator.

item.title: ARK: Survival Evolved
item.description: Game Description The world ofARK: Survival Evolved is a setting full of dangers, in which not only dinosaurs, but also other creatures will try to kill you. People become especially dangerous. The game does not have any interesting plot, but there is a huge open world in which you have to build your base, hunt with a group of people (your friends), attack, defend, make weapons and explore the area. This is a full-fledged survival simulator from the first person (possibly from the 3rd person), where survival is limited to a base with a fire.

item.title: VTOL VR
item.description: Game Description VTOL VR is a military flight simulator with a first-person view and in the surroundings of the near future. The game requires a VR headset and a motion controller. The title allows you to freely rotate your head while sitting in the virtual cockpit. Modes include training, campaign and free flight. There are a lot of tasks here. In addition to other aircraft, ships, tanks, anti-aircraft and artillery installations act as opponents and allies.

item.title: Slime Rancher
item.description: Game Description A funny open-world first-person shooter -Slime Rancher is a mixture of genres in one complex picture, which the developers called - Boundless Outland. We plunge into a special experimental environment. Our hero’s name is Beatrix LeBeau, and he is a farmer. Armed with courage, madness and a funny vacuum cleaner, he decides to stay on the planet of the Boundless Outlands, because a certain Hobson Twillgers left us his farm.

item.title: The Long Dark
item.description: Game Description A game about survival in a world without electricity. The Long Dark is eternal darkness in locations, gorgeous graphics from developers who love the sky and stars as their second home. Players were pleased that the entire gameplay is divided into two modes. The first is a story-based passage of 5 episodes, the total duration of which is 60-70 hours, depending on how the plot is followed. The second mode is survival in an excellent open world, where you will have to keep an eye on the contents of your backpack, check for items, collect skins, fry meat, take refuge in shelters, furnish your own house or a small corner in a house for survivors, where the owner of this establishment will shelter you.

item.title: Brigand: Oaxaca
item.description: Game Description Brigand: Oaxaca is a first -person shooter hybrid, immersive simulator and role -playing game. The project has three -dimensional low -polygonal graphics. Due to her, the title resembles computer action of the late 90s and early 2000s. The action takes place in a world where nuclear apocalypse happened. Events unfold on the territory of the Mexican state of Ohak. Indi-game combines elements of different settings. In it, the gunshot weapons are adjacent to Voodoo magic, and not only mutters, but also demons roam the wastelands.

item.title: Unturned
item.description: Game Description Unturned combines a zombie-player and a sandbox with survival elements. In the single, the user studies locations, destroys the undead, looking for a useful lutus. In the multiplayer, the user is engaged in about the same, but also fights with living opponents. There is also a separate regime of the royal battle. Players who kill other gamers for no reason become bandits. You can become a hero, having taken up the shooting of criminals.

item.title: NEKO Navy
item.description: Game Description In Neko Navy, gamers are taken under the management of flying cats, opposing a whole army of various opponents. The main conflict of this scroll-player is unfolding at seven dynamic levels with horizontal scrolling, filled with continuous air battles. Six unique cat pilots are available to choose from, each of which acts as an avatar of the player and has its own characteristics. The storyline consistently leads to a special final event designed to resolve the main intrigue and complete the main story.

item.title: Ravenfield
item.description: Game Description The team-tactical shooterRavenfield will allow you to plunge into furious battles, where you have everything - from tanks to fleets. There is a complete lack of storyline and even multiplayer. The latter fact is extremely unusual for projects of this genre. It would seem that it is interesting to play against bots and when there are no real users on the map. This omission at first glance is more than compensated for by a fairly developed artificial intelligence - opponents and allies behave extremely intelligently and together with them you can perform a variety of tactics using numerous commands and options.

item.title: Little Nightmares
item.description: Game Description Little Six is ​​a girl who was brought on board the ship as a servant. She, like many nomes - the characters of the game - hides her face for unknown reasons. In the game we have to get out from the lowest sector to the upper decks, but the levels will not immediately allow us to do this. First, the player needs to know that sinister hands will always hunt for us.

item.title: Revhead
item.description: Game Description In the REVHEAD car racing simulator, the user will have to design his own car. The protagonist has a friend named Charlie who is well versed in creating cars. He invites the central character to Australia to help him with something. It will be necessary to win the competition and get recognition from Charlie, then it will create improved transport. There is an opportunity to sell and buy cars, as well as trade in various details and customization items.

item.title: Hollow Knight
item.description: Game Description The classic action-platformer gives us several hours of exciting travel into underground cities to creatures that have only guarded wealth for the last thousand years, being possessed by it. Our hero inHollow Knight is one of those who believe in legends. He goes to the dungeons under Mudmouth to gain riches, fame, general respect and popularity among the knights who did not gather the strength to descend, but will it really be so?

item.title: ASTRONER
item.description: Game Description New resources inASTRONEER are presented in the form of any discovery on other planets, and everything that a person could bring with him after a galactic expedition was bought up at a clean price. There was an explosion in the world. Humanity is again hunting for “gold”, sending its compatriots into space. However, in the 25th century, when humanity has fully explored space, they send people to distant planets, where all that is known is that the planets are just as round.

item.title: Sally Face
item.description: Game Description Sally Face has a rather depressing but intriguing atmosphere with a predominant detective style of storytelling. The main character, Sully, lost his mother and is now moving to another city with his father. Soon after the move, a murder occurs. Now we need to understand a whole series of mystical and occult events. Game Features: An adventure game with an intriguing atmosphere of mysticism, occultism and slight absurdity. Lots of puzzles and riddles.

item.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
item.description: Game Description Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun is a tactical stealth action game set in the Japanese Edo era (1603-1868). A conspiracy led by Kage-sama is carried out against the new shogun, after he was able to unite the lands of Japan. In order not to destroy the world, the ruler instructs his henchman samurai named Mugen to track down Kage-sama and his organization. For these purposes, the hero enlists the support of four companions - masters of secrecy and penetration.

item.title: Space Cat
item.description: Game Description Space Cat sends a cat to a changeable asteroid field with the main task of collecting production. Players have to collect precious stones, coins and diamonds, moving in a dangerous environment. The area itself is constantly transformed: rockets destroy its areas, and the ULO is restored, requiring an instant reaction for survival. The difficulty level is adjusted - you can turn on or disable individual threats before the start, as well as change the parameters of the character.

item.title: A magical High School Girl
item.description: Game Description A Magical High School Girl puts a student in a magical dimension, where her only means of protection is the magic that she creates personally. This role -playing game is based on a mechanic that allows the player to come up with the names for his own spells. Based on the words introduced into the interface, the system automatically generates the spontaneous properties and combat effects of the spell.

item.title: Stellar Tactics
item.description: Game Description Stellar Tactics is an exciting journey through the unknown expanses of space. This game combines mechanics from a variety of genres, for example, from group tactical turn-based strategies or exploratory adventure games. The player is offered the role of a discoverer of many star systems that remained untouched during the colonization of space. There are 160,000 universes with their own stars and varying numbers of planets in them. The player always chooses what he wants to do - story missions or side activities that are not required to be mastered.

item.title: Niche - a genetics survival game
item.description: Game Description Genetic survival game Niche - a genetics survival game will allow you to deal with the population of special foxes. To survive, you need to collect edible plants or hunt very nimble game that brings a large supply of meat. The gameplay feature is the gene. The game allows you to experiment with DNA and pair a dominant gene with a recessive one, and then observe the result. Then find a new nest of other creatures and hatch completely new individuals.

item.title: Super Destronaut
item.description: Game Description Super Destronaut puts a player at the head of one warship, opposing built alien invaders built. Gamers control their horizontal axis vessel in the lower part of the screen, which is a design borrowed from the Arcadian shooters of the 1980s. The main task is to methodically disassemble the waves of opponents, descending along the specified trajectories, where each eliminated enemy replenishes the general account. During clashes, defeated aliens can leave temporary amplifiers that directly increase the rate of fire or scatter of shells, providing a tactical advantage for cleaning the battlefield.

item.title: No Man's Sky
item.description: Game Description Travel on an intergalactic level has become too simple and ordinary. It’s becoming increasingly difficult to create a game that captivates with its graphics, but the developers ofNo Man’s Sky, an indie adventure game with an open world and a wonderful RPG base, were able to recreate the image of space. Distant, limitless, completely open and so human. We play as a character, but then our gameplay switches to an entire space station or ship.

item.title: Human: Fall Flat
item.description: Game Description Human: Fall Flat is an adventure puzzle game with amazing physics and engine. Take control of Bob, who every time has a dream from which he must find a way out. Usually such dreams are accompanied by colorful locations in which he needs to get to a certain point and solve many difficult problems. Explore the open world in your own way. Climb any building, rock, tree or other object, going through the same place differently each time.

item.title: Starbound
item.description: Game Description Starbound is a 2D side-scrolling indie RPG adventure with graphics that reference the classic 8-bit titles of the last century. The project has become widespread thanks to the ability to play with a friend in co-op mode on different platforms, as well as a well-developed system of achievements and rewards that motivate you to improve your own skills and collect all kinds of items for crafting and collecting. The surrounding world is presented in the form of open territories, where there are no prohibitions on colonizing unknown planets or performing secondary tasks; you can even not touch the story campaign at all.

item.title: Dead Age
item.description: Game Description Dead Age has an excellent and non-linear story, consisting of many choices that lead to 6 different endings. You will have to carefully study the text of the tasks, otherwise the members of your squad of survivors will inexorably dwindle. The point of the game is to survive as many days as possible, replenishing food supplies, tools and new survivors. But don’t think that everything is so simple, in addition to collecting, the game has daily events that will fill your every new day in the game with various difficulties or opportunities.

item.title: INSIDE
item.description: Game Description A side-view platformer -INSIDE - tells the story of a small and unarmed boy who, through an unknown means, ended up in a closed, scary space. The physics of the game and the gameplay invite us to go through the platformer to the last level with a lot of deaths, puzzles, solving difficult problems and good visuals, combined with the atmosphere and the usual soundtrack. The death of our hero is an endlessly scary animation.

item.title: The Room Two
item.description: Game Description A puzzle game where in the first part you manipulated a magic clock mechanism. In the second part of the game, they were given the opportunity to walk around different rooms, solving various riddles. The Room Two - Follows a mysterious path with the help of letters from a scientist known as “AS”. The hero is trapped in a pocket dimension. He must find the author of the notes.

item.title: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
item.description: Game Description VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action is an adventure simulator of a bartender in the setting of a dystopian future, where humanity finds itself under the control of huge corporations dictating the rules of life, and nanorobots controlling every area of ​​human activity and the implementation of laws and regulations adopted new world government. Stylistically, this project refers to Japanese games of the last century. The gameplay consists of communicating with bar visitors and providing them with high-quality service in order to build warm, friendly relationships with them.

item.title: Wayward
item.description: Game Description Survive in the wild in Wayward, traveling around the open world. The protagonist has no basic specialization, as he passes, he pumps skills and becomes capable of everything. To get new characteristics, you have to interact with objects and the world around you. You have the opportunity to play as you want. The world is endless and generated randomly. Objects, chests, opponents, dangers, dungeons and tasks are also created by chance.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description InEnter the Gungeon you will remember such a genre as bullet hell or “hell of bullets”. The main characters explore the Gungeon and try to find a legendary artifact - a weapon that can kill the past. To do this, you need to fight your way through hordes of monsters and defeat formidable bosses. Loot, secrets, penny-pinching merchants and shopkeepers, new equipment and more loot - the recipe for a good game.

item.title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
item.description: Game Description The gameHot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades can be called a full-fledged weapons simulator. You need to go to the training ground, which contains a huge selection of different firearms: pistols, machine guns, shotguns, rocket launchers, grenades, etc. You can use any available ammunition, training on targets and taking the highest positions on the leaderboard. Afterwards you can go and set off fireworks. Targets can be not only static within the walls of a gray pavilion, but also moving in open space.

item.title: Stardew Valley
